title: Research and Markets: Security Systems Market in Russia 2015-2019 - Increased Domestic and International Security Threats & Adoption of Cloud-based Video Surveillance Systems
text:
Research and Markets: Security Systems Market in Russia 2015-2019 - Increased Domestic and International Security Threats & Adoption of Cloud-based Video Surveillance Systems September 29, 2015 10:19 AM   
DUBLIN-  Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/q2d53c/security_systems ) has announced the addition of the "Security Systems Market in Russia 2015-2019" report to their offering. 
The security systems market in Russia to grow at a CAGR of 13.27% over the period 2014-2019. 
This report covers the present scenario and growth prospects of the security systems market in Russia for the period 2015-2019. It also presents the vendor landscape and a corresponding detailed analysis of the top five vendors in the security systems market in Russia. In addition, the report discusses the major drivers influencing the growth of the market. It also outlines the challenges faced by the vendors and the market at large, as well as the emerging key trends. 
According to the report, in recent years, there has been an increase in terrorist attacks, data theft, and shoplifting. This loss of data, including financial and strategic data, from organizations can be catastrophic. Therefore, surveillance devices are being used to track people involved in data theft and criminal activities. As a result, the market has witnessed an increased adoption of monitoring solutions to prevent unauthorized intrusion to property and information. An increase in domestic and international security threats will be a major driver of the security systems market in Russia during the forecast period. 
Further, the report states that one of the major challenges in this market is the requirement for high initial investment. 
To calculate the market size, the report considers the revenue generated from the sale of the following products: Surveillance Systems
